posts.subject: Anthology Hentai Repository
posts.body:
[Anthology](/1ChByYBAm9S5pT7F3pckjSTb2wxTaYwGeX/) is my collection of japanese hentai magazines (2500+ volumes and counting).

Magazines with a focus on lolis:
- 166 volumes of COMIC LO
- 39 volumes of Little Pierce
- 27 volumes of COMIC Mate Legend
- 17 volumes of COMIC ino
- 17 volumes of Puni Pedo and Digital Puni Pedo
- 11 volumes of Shoujo Kumikyoku
- 10 volumes of Shoujo Shiki
- 10 volumes of Little Girl Strike
- 8 volumes of PLUM LS
- 5 volumes of Hinakan High
- 6+3+2 of COMIC Alice Club/Collection/Sister

It's searchable using [1+gallery](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/) if you want to be selective ;-)

Searching `female:lolicon` for example limits it to 1468 volumes (most of which will only contain a couple of lolicon chapters though). Sadly it's not possible to search chapters by tag, and even if the feature existed it'd be an insane amount of work to tag all of the individual chapters, so don't get your hopes up.

> 2684
2773 now, and I still got a couple of thousand sitting on my hard drive doing nothing.

Added some COMIC Mate Legend (27) and PLUM LS (8) among other things.

>>bf7addac-ebaf-4f87-836b-76a00a8155c3
that should be avoidable with `!:futanari !:futa`

I like update it at least once every two weeks, but it's often more frequent. Also looking for ideas to spread awareness both on ZeroNet and the clearnet.

>>cbf056ae-d3d7-4f6c-a60a-75aa882b7e18
nice, gonna check it out

Added another bunch, mostly Action Pizazz and Namaiki!, but also iincluding some loli with COMIC Shoujo Tengoku and Hinakan.

>>d8a07f4e-dccf-47c1-8e6a-02f2df1dcf13
Biggest update in a while:
- 300+ Megastore issues
- 100+ Action Pizazz
- 38 Microne Magazine (giantess)
- 10 Koushoku Shounen (yaoi)
- 10 Dengeki Moeoh (artbook)
- 4 Kindan Kanin
- 4 Ikenie Ichiba
- 3 Corona Blossom
- 1 Comic KYAAHH
- 1 Comic Sugirl M's Action
- 1 Comic MANTEN
- Fills for Anthurium, Ananga Ranga, Kairakuten, Bavel, HOTMiLK, AUN, KURiBERON, Shitsurakuten, Shingeki, Pai;kuu, Moe e Hime, Orga, Gaticomi, Futanari Secrosse/Excellent, MILF

For the loli fans I've included:
- Karyou Gakuen Shotoubu (37)
- Kyoodain (2)
As well as some fills:
- Shoujo Kumikyoku Vol.12
- COMIC LO Vol.188

>>619e8c45-5635-43ac-8eee-3e27a3444ff4
I didn't remove any pages, but it does look like one chapter is missing. I'll mark it as incomplete.

It's been a while since I posted an update on 08chan.

- Uploaded my entire collection of 2k+ translated hentai tankoubons (yay!!)
- Uploaded 1k+ untranslated hentai tankoubons
- Uploaded 5k+ untranslated magazine issues
- Uploaded 374 translated manhwa series (barely any loli, give ["My First Time Is With... My Little Sister"](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/126Temra5S4SmEpt1DVcxy1nhEJBhyUPvr/porori_my-first-time-is-with-my-little-sister_EN) a try though)

Someone sent me [this Loli portal](/1LoLisb8RqNfTbQXp5dAFasmUJ9mAxwetX), so I'm sharing it here.

I'll continue adding untranslated tankoubons, I've got some 19k to go, as well as a couple of thousand of magazine issues.
